name: Dehradun and Mussoorie
info: The fascinating queen of Himalayas will provide you with the perfect escapade from the monotony of routine life. (3 Days Trip)

name: Rishikesh
info: Experience the spiritual bliss of the splashing Ganges, the exhilaration of standing on a hanging bridge, and much more !! (2 Days Trip)

name: Rishikesh Adventure Special
info: You will literally live on the edge and perform river-rafting and camping with abundant safety measures. (2 Days Trip)

name: Agra and Fatehpur Sikri
info: A visit to Taj Mahal with your special ones ignites the relationship you share. Such is the power of this marvellous piece of architecture. (2 Days Trip)

name: Agra and Fatehpur Sikri
info: A visit to Taj Mahal with your special ones ignites the relationship you share. Such is the power of this marvellous piece of architecture. (1 Day Trip)

name: Binsar and Gwaldam
info: You will feel a unique calmness and explorer-like thrills while you travel through the less explored and serene destinations. (3 Days Trip)

name: Pithoragarh
info: A majestic fort curved in green hills, acting as a passage way among mountains  with scenic views of snow peaks are a treasure to cherish. (3 Days Trip)

name: Binsar-Chaukari
info: Panoramic view of snow-capped series of higher Himalayas blazing with rays of sunset and sunrise is your ideal escaped. (3 Days Trip)

name: Mussoorie-Chamba
info: The foothills of Himalayas and its virgin destinations will enthrall and embrace you and make your journey memorable. (3 Days Trip)

name: Jaipur
info: The confluence of color, culture, terrains and art has earned Jaipur the reputation of Paris of the East. Revel in the glory of the Pink City !! (2 Days Trip)

name: Jaipur
info: The confluence of color, culture, terrains and art has earned Jaipur the reputation of Paris of the East. Revel in the glory of the Pink City !! (3 Days Trip)

name: Khajuraho
info: A UNESCO world heritage site in central India, Khajuraho is a world famous tourist and archaeological destination. (1 Day Trip)

name: Khajuraho
info: A UNESCO world heritage site in central India, Khajuraho is a world famous tourist and archaeological destination. (2 Days Trip)
